subject: Add missing metadefs for shutdown behavior

values.-1: This patch needs further work before it can be merged
values.+1: Looks good to me, but someone else must approve

messages.message: Uploaded patch set 1.

Patch Set 1:

I chatted with Phil Day about creating this patch and was able to verify the behavior in Horizon and the Nova API.  I uploaded the metadata definition, used the Horizon UI to apply the metadata to an image with a timeout of 25 seconds.  Then I went to n-cpu screen session where I was able to see the following log message when I shut down the instance. This verified that Nova used the property from the Metadata Definitions Catalog.

2014-09-12 14:32:46.102 INFO nova.virt.libvirt.driver [req-31230a25-920b-463b-8138-ee9e83008e51 admin admin] [instance: 0cef19ea-e1a2-4c4d-8257-fbd53bc49f34] Instance failed to shutdown in 25 seconds.

Patch Set 1: Verified-1

Patch Set 1:

to try / view in horizon with latest devstack, just do:

git review -d 121188
glance --os-image-api-version 2 md-namespace-import --file etc/metadefs/compute-guest-shutdown.json

Go into horizon -> admin -> images -> update metadata action

Alternatively:
git review -d 121188
glance-manage db_load_metadefs

Patch Set 2:

(1 comment)

Patch Set 2:

Phil Day and I exchanged messages about this (Phil wrote the Nova patch).  The net result is that neither of us could come up with what would be a reasonable upper limit given that we don't know what the workloads being deployed will be.  Perhaps having something as high as a week or more could make sense? 

Tripp, Travis S [11:41 AM]: 
So, I'm adding this as a property that should show up in the Horizon UI (patches about to land).
I can set maximum value
should I set a max?
Day, Phil [11:42 AM]: 
I'm not sure what a sensible max would be - windows can take ages for example if its running something like SQLserver (or so I hear)
Tripp, Travis S [11:42 AM]: 
that's what I was thinking as well...

Patch Set 2: Code-Review+2

Ok, thanks.

Any potential fallout (I'm not even sure what that might be) from the lack of a maximum would hit Nova rather than Glance, so if there is no strong support for a max from the Nova side I've no objections.
Patch Set 2: Code-Review+2 Workflow+1
